name: Spicy Pineapple-Cucumber Sangrita
description: Combine cooling cucumber with tangy pineapple to make this tropical version of sangrita, a traditional accompaniment to good sipping tequila.
recipeIngredient: Pinch Pequin chili powder (you can substitute cayenne or another hot red chili powder)

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, combine pineapple juice, lime juice, cucumber juice, sugar, and chili powder. Stir until sugar is completely dissolved. Season very lightly with salt. Taste and adjust ingredients as desired. Chill in the refrigerator or by stirring with ice briefly and then straining. Serve in a shot glass alongside a good-quality silver tequila.
